So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4069>"Why<s%> is your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7451>sad<s%> though you are not <S%H2470>sick<s%>? <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> but <S%H7455>sadness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>" Then I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> should my <S%H6440>face<s%> not be <S%H7489>sad<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of my fathers' <S%H6913>tombs,<s%> lies <S%H2720>desolate<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> have been <S%H398>consumed<s%> by <S%H784>fire<s%>?"
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> would you <S%H1245>request<s%>?" So I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H3190>found<s%> <S%H3190>favor<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H7971>send<s%> me to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of my fathers' <S%H6913>tombs,<s%> that I may <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> it."

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, the <S%H7694>queen<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> him, <S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> will your <S%H4109>journey<s%> be, and <S%H4970>when<s%> will you <S%H7725>return<s%>?" So it <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> me, and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H2165>definite<s%> <S%H2165>time.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let <S%H107>letters<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> me for the <S%H6346>governors<s%> [of the provinces] <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> that they may allow me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%>

and a <S%H107>letter<s%> to <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6508>forest,<s%> that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> to <S%H9529>make<s%> <S%H9529>beams<s%> for the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1002>fortress<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> for the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and for the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H935>go.<s%> "And the king <S%H5414>granted<s%> [them] to me because the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> [was] on me.

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> [of the provinces] <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H107>letters.<s%> Now the king had <S%H7971>sent<s%> with me <S%H8269>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And when <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H5650>official<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [about it,] it was <S%H9567>very<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H7489>displeasing<s%> to them that <S%H120>someone<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H9186>welfare<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And I <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> I and a <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with me. Then I <S%H5674>passed<s%> on to the <S%H9407>Fountain<s%> <S%H8179>Gate<s%> and the King's <S%H1295>Pool,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H929>mount<s%> to <S%H5674>pass.<s%>

So I <S%H5927>went<s%> up at <S%H3915>night<s%> by the <S%H5158>ravine<s%> and <S%H9580>inspected<s%> the <S%H2346>wall.<s%> Then I <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H1516>Valley<s%> <S%H8179>Gate<s%> again and <S%H7725>returned.<s%>

And the <S%H5461>officials<s%> did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H575>where<s%> I had <S%H1980>gone<s%> or <S%H4100>what<s%> I had <S%H6213>done;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> had I as <S%H3651>yet<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> the <S%H5461>officials,<s%> or the <S%H3499>rest<s%> who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H9567>situation<s%> we are in, that <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H2720>desolate<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H3341>burned<s%> by <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> let us <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> that we may <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be a <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>"

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H1129>build.<s%>" So they <S%H2388>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H9186>good<s%> [work.]

Are you <S%H4775>rebelling<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>?"

So I <S%H7725>answered<s%> them and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> will <S%H6743>give<s%> us <S%H6743>success;<s%> therefore we His <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H1129>build,<s%> but you <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>portion,<s%> <S%H6666>right,<s%> or <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
